titles: A proclamation prohibiting the payment and receipt of tonnage and ponndage [sic], and other impositions upon merchandises, under colour of the late pretended ordinance of both Houses of Parliament
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
notes: At head of title: By the King.
"Given under our signe manuall at our court of Oxford, the sixteenth day December, in the eighteenth yeare of our reigne."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Tonnage fees --  Legal status, laws, etc. --  Great Britain.
